statements: UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_type='Email', interaction_data='{"subject":"New Email","content":"Hello, this is a test email."}' WHERE customer_id=123 AND portal_id=1;
UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_timestamp='2022-02-15 10:30:00', interaction_type='Phone Call' WHERE customer_id=456 AND portal_id=2;
UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET interaction_type = 'purchase', interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND portal_id = 1;

UPDATE interactions_table SET interaction_type = 'chat' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE portal_usage_table SET time_spent_seconds = 300, page_visited = 'home' WHERE usage_id = 100;
UPDATE interactions_table SET interaction_type = 'Customer Support' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND interaction_id = 1;
